frontmatter.title: Getting Started with Ethereum Development
frontmatter.description: This is a beginner's guide to getting started with Ethereum development. We’ll take you from spinning up an API endpoint, to making a command line request, to writing your first web3 script! No blockchain development experience necessary!
frontmatter.author: Elan Halpern
